amendment.description: To reduce the amount rescinded from International Organizations and Programs and to ensure that UNICEF receives all of the funding previously appropriated to it by Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2896 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 408.

action.text: Amendment SA 2896 proposed by Senator Ossoff to Amendment SA 2853.
